Folder structure:

- `src/`: Contains the source code for the components.
- `src/<component>/`: Contains the individual components.
  - Each component has its own folder with the following structure:
    - `index.ts`: Exports all the relevant data.
    - `<ComponentName>.tsx`: Contains the main component code.
    - `styles.ts`: Contains styles for the component.
    - `types.ts`: Contains TypeScript types for the component.
    - `<ComponentName>.test.tsx`: Contains tests for the component.
    - `<ComponentName>.stories.tsx`: Contains Storybook stories for the component.
- `src/index.ts`: Exports all components for easy import.
